DOC.brief_summary: This study will investigate if the drug zoledronic acid given once yearly is safe and has beneficial effects in treating osteoporosis by reducing bone loss and fractures in men with osteoporosis.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy in Reducing Fractures and Safety of Zoledronic Acid in Men With Osteoporosis
